title: Have A Compassionate Heart | Victoria Osteen
itunes:title: Have A Compassionate Heart | Victoria Osteen
description:
God wants to use us to share His love, but sometimes we get so busy that we overlook the people around us. If we’re going to live the full life that God has prepared for us, we need to learn to stir up our hearts with compassion.

Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
